attributes.action: criminalise prioritising returning isis fighters for any state funded benefit
attributes.additional_details: these people left the country making themselves homeless, they have no case for priority
attributes.background: stop returning isis fighters being given priority in housing above people already on the social housing lists.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204086
